channel.title: My New Hugo Site

item.title: Neovim Hotkeys
item.description: Neovim Hotkeys autocomplete C-x C-o C-n C-f

item.title: NeoVim plugin
item.description: Use nvim not neovim Config location ~/.config/nvim/init.vim typecal plugin vim-plug: the plugin manager NERDTree: NERDTreeToggle deoplete: and deoplete-go

item.title: Golang rand.Seed
item.description: Rand in Go rand in go is not random since the rand.Seed rand.Seed(time.Now().UnixNano()) rand.Intn(100) // e.g. 100

item.title: About
item.description: Hugo is the worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites. It is written in Go. It makes use of a variety of open source projects including: https://github.com/russross/blackfriday https://github.com/alecthomas/chroma https://github.com/muesli/smartcrop https://github.com/spf13/cobra https://github.com/spf13/viper Learn more and contribute on GitHub.
